author: kfogel
msg: Improve the depth logic underlying svn_repos_dir_delta2().
This takes care of some TODO(sd) comments, and is part of issue #2844.
(add_file_or_dir, replace_file_or_dir): Take new depth arg and pass
(delta_dirs): Same, and consider depth more carefully when deciding
whether to act on an entry.

author: cmpilato
msg: For Berkeley DB 4.6 compatibility: abstract the cursor handle methods,
as they've been renamed in Berkeley DB 4.6.
NOTE: This isn't strictly necessary at this time (the old names are
deprecated by not removed), but we might as well make the change now.
New macros for abstracting Berkeley DB cursor handle methods.
Update all uses of cursor handle methods to instead use the new macros.

author: hwright
msg: Add some more documentation, and fix a memory leak.
(svn_repos__walk_ancestry): Add some docstrings; destroy a subpool.
